SELECT TO_CHAR(CREATED_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as postDate, COUNT(DISTINCT q.QNA_ID) as qnaCount, COUNT(DISTINCT z.ZIP_ID) + COUNT(DISTINCT d.DN_ID) as zipCount, -- 넣을거 없어서 그냥 둘다 합쳐서 카운트하기로함 이름은 그대로 사용할까 고민중임 COUNT(DISTINCT e.EVENT_ID) as eventCount, COUNT(DISTINCT r.REPORT_ID) as reportCount, COUNT(DISTINCT h.HELP_ID) as helpCount FROM
(SELECT TRUNC(SYSDATE) - LEVEL + 1 as CREATED_DATE FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 7) dates LEFT JOIN ADMIN.QNA_BOARD q ON TRUNC(q.QNA_CREATED_AT) = dates.CREATED_DATE LEFT JOIN ADMIN.ZIP_BOARD z ON TRUNC(z.ZIP_CREATED_AT) = dates.CREATED_DATE LEFT JOIN ADMIN.DN_BOARD d ON TRUNC(d.DN_CREATED_AT) = dates.CREATED_DATE LEFT JOIN ADMIN.EVENT_BOARD e ON TRUNC(e.EVENT_CREATED_AT) = dates.CREATED_DATE LEFT JOIN ADMIN.REPORT r ON TRUNC(r.REPORT_CREATED_AT) = dates.CREATED_DATE LEFT JOIN ADMIN.HELP_BOARD h ON TRUNC(h.HELP_CREATED_AT) = dates.CREATED_DATE GROUP BY TO_CHAR(CREATED_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY postDate DESC

SELECT TO_CHAR(dates.CREATED_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as chartDate, COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN TRUNC(u.SIGN_UP_DATE) = dates.CREATED_DATE THEN u.USERS_ID END) as newMembers, COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN TRUNC(u.SIGN_UP_DATE) <= dates.CREATED_DATE THEN u.USERS_ID END) as totalMembers FROM (SELECT TRUNC(SYSDATE) - LEVEL + 1 as CREATED_DATE FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 7 ) dates LEFT JOIN ADMIN.USERS u ON TRUNC(u.SIGN_UP_DATE) <= dates.CREATED_DATE GROUP BY dates.CREATED_DATE ORDER BY dates.CREATED_DATE
